title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 41-A
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 41-A
State Regulations

Image
STATE OF NEW YORK
JONES BEACH STATE PARKWAY AUTHORITY
NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING
STATE ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY REVIEW ACT OF 1975 - SEQR
AGENCY IMPLEMENTATION REGULATIONS
Subdivision 3 of Section 8-0113 of Article 8, of Environmental

Conservation Law, the State Environmental Quality Review Act of 1975 - SEQR, states: "3. Within one hundred twenty days after the commissioner
adopts such rules and regulations the agencies subject to this article shall, after public hearing, adopt and publish such additional procedures as may be
necessary for the implementation by them of this article consistent with the
rules and regulations adopted by the commissioner. (a) Existing agency environmental procedures may be
incorporated in and integrated with the procedures adopted under this article, and variance in form alone shall constitute no objection thereto. Such agency
procedures shall be no less protective of environmental values, public
participation, and agency and judicial review than the procedures herein
mandated. (b) Such agency procedures shall provide for interagency
working relationships in cases where actions typically involve more than one
agency, liaison with the public, and such other procedures as may be required
to effect the efficient and expeditious administration of this article."
Rules and regulations of statewide applicability were adopted
by the Commissioner of Environmental Conservation as Part 617 of Title 6 of the

Official Compilation of Codes, Rules and Regulations of the State of New York
on March 19, 1976. As required by Subdivision 3 of Section 8-0113 of Article 8, cited above, the Jones Beach State Parkway Authority has drafted additional
procedures, SEQR Agency Implementation Regulations, that apply to its own
actions and to those actions over which it has jurisdiction. Notice is hereby given that pursuant to subdivision 3 of

Section 8-0113 of Article 8 of Environmental Conservation Law, cited above, the

Jones Beach State Parkway Authority will cause a public hearing to be held to
review its draft SEQR Agency Implementation Regulations at the following place
and time: July 30, 1976 at 10:00 a.m. Conference Room - 2nd Floor

Jones Beach State Parkway Authority

Administration Building

Belmont Lake State Park

Babylon, New York 11702

The purpose of this hearing is to obtain the views of all
interested persons, municipalities, organizations, corporations of agencies of
the State regarding the adoption of the Jones Beach State Parkway Authority's
SEQR Agency Implementation Regulations. The hearing will continue until all
persons present who wish to be heard have been heard. Written statements are
encouraged. Statements received prior to or presented at the hearing will be
considered part of the official record. The record of the hearing will retain
open until August 6, 1976 for additional written statements. These may be sent
to William J. Delaney, Director, Jones Beach State Parkway Authority, Box 247, Babylon, New York 11702. Copies of the proposed regulations will be available at the

Jones Beach State Parkway Authority, Administration Building, Belmont Lake

State Park, Babylon, New York 11702

William, J. Delaney Dated Babylon, New York, July 19, 1976

Director Jones Beach State Parkway Authority

Notes

41-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
